nodes.text: Rao was a male swoop bike racer on the old Mos Espa Grand Arena in 8.5 ABY. He built a swoop bike, which was basically a Podracer engine with a seat attached. It was a very fast bike but after it killed six people Ulda, the owner of the Grand Arena, bought it. When Han and Leia Organa Solo searched for the painting Killik Twilight, Ulda gave them Rao's swoop bike to chase down her ex-husband Kitster.
